definition: A person who engages in the activity of ascending or climbing, typically referring to someone who enjoys rock climbing or mountaineering.

examples.german: Der erfahrene Kletterer hat viele Gipfel erklommen.
examples.english: The experienced climber has climbed many peaks.

examples.german: Der Kletterer hat eine steile Wand erklommen.
examples.english: The climber has climbed a steep wall.
